text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar This is as good as a pink slip. The moment he praises you while denying reports of firing you is the exact moment you know you are dead to him. Get ready to become the “fall guy” when the reckoning of the administration’s poor coronavirus response comes. #DeadManWalking
